title: Insurance policy documents
dataVerified: Policyholder name, policy number, coverage amounts, coverage terms, insurer name, effective dates, premium amount
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Policy status (active/cancelled/lapsed). Link to insurer policy system (policyholders and third parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake insurance policies used in mortgage fraud and contractor fraud. Domain binding verifies insurer legitimacy. Tamper-evident coverage terms prevent policy alteration. Certificate of insurance verification for third parties. Prevents coverage inflation in loan applications. Critical for lenders and contractors who rely on insurance verification.
